steps.headline: Cut into triangles or fingers for serving at afternoon tea or a luncheon.

text: Mash the cooked peas into a paste.  Add the chopped mint, sugar, and vinegar or lemon juice. Mix through until combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Butter the bread (or not if you prefer).  Spread the mashed pea spread over the bread.  Remove the crusts. Use a warm knife to cut the crusts from the slices. Cut into triangles or fingers for serving at afternoon tea or a luncheon.
